ProView2.lib v2.0.2                                                  02-Jul-2003
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

SN PV2 Library Package release 1.03

Copyright (c) SN Systems Ltd 2003, All rights reserved

1. Contents
2. What's New
3. Installation
4. Release notes
5. Support


1. Contents
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This zip contains the following files:

 cdroot\*		; Files for ProView 2.x.x for Sony libs 2.7.0
 app.cmd
 CopyIopImage.bat
 main.c
 Makefile
 MakePVISO.bat
 MakePVISO2336.bat
 ProView2 library UG.pdf
 ProView2 library UG-J.pdf
 ProView2.h
 ProView2.lib
 ProView2.dsp
 ps2.lk
 PS2_in_VC.h
 PV2_0.000
 LinkSegment_PS2.lcf
 ProView2.mcp
 PV2_CW.bat		; For CodeWarrior project
 PREFIX_PS2_RELEASE.h


2. What's New
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Release 1.03:
- Added PREFIX_PS2_RELEASE.h (for CodeWarrior).

Release 1.02:
- Added a CodeWarrior project.

Release 1.01:
- Added Japanese documentation.


3. Installation
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Unzip into a new sub-folder (eg) under your ProView installation folder.


4. Release notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

ProView2.lib can be used to generate the ProView EE target files SNMON.ELF
and SLPS_999.99 for any version of the Sony libs.

These files can then be used to generate a bootable PS2 CD-ROM for the version
of the Sony libs that you are interested in using.

See 'ProView2 library UG.pdf' for details.


5. Support
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you experience any difficulties using this product please contact the SN 
support team at ps2support@snsys.com.
